message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you can have the rest.
Your turn Alice, how about a more balanced 60/40 split in my favor?  Consider the depreciation!
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need at least 650,000 to make it worth my while with the inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you almost half while you're facing a rapidly shrinking pot.  Take the deal before it's too late!
